about_the_game:
Decamped is a first-person puzzle adventure game that finds the character waking up to an overgrown desolate world. They must face their past in order to move forward and unravel the mystery of what happened in Deckner.

This is our first demo of the game, which contains the introduction, as well as the first level in the game, and we are aiming to have the complete game published in April of 2021!

If you enjoyed our demo, or even played it all, we'd love to hear your feedback.

Since this is very early on in development, we expect there to be bugs. If you come across any of them, feel free to join our discord, or share them in the comments!

Join our discord server to give feedback, as well as interact with our devs and our small community!
